movie.title: A Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood
movie.plot: Based on the true story of a real-life friendship between Fred Rogers and journalist Lloyd Vogel.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 57 nominations.

events.title: "Can You Say ... Hero?", an article about Fred Rogers, is published in Esquire magazine
